content.raw: Yes, you are correct about this. For a while we had a workaround (the fixed length strings hack in labscript_utils) in place that would save all strings in h5 files as fixed-length strings for the sake of LabVIEW, but h5labview changed a long time ago to be able to read the vlen types so we haven't had to use that workaround.
content.html: Yes, you are correct about this. For a while we had a workaround (the fixed length strings hack in labscript_utils) in place that would save all strings in h5 files as fixed-length strings for the sake of LabVIEW, but h5labview changed a long time ago to be able to read the vlen types so we haven't had to use that workaround.
